G.T.6048
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - NOON - 20th OCTOBER, 1918.
1. WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
This morning we attacked the enemy's positions on the line of the SELLE North of LE CATEAU on a front of about 10 miles, and have crossed the SELLE all along and gained possession of the vilalge of SOLESMES and the high ground to the East of the SELLE.
North of the SENSEE we have completed the capture of DENAIN and are continuing to advance along the whole line between DENAIN and COURTRAI.
In FLANDERS the Belgians have now reached the Dutch frontier and a general line from there to AELTRE, LOOTENHULLE, VYNCKT, GRAMMENE, OESSELGHEM to the LYS Canal North of OYGHEM.
French Front.
There is nothing to report.
2. ITALIAN, MACDONIAN and PALESTINE FRONTS.
There is no change.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1,
20th October, 1918.
Issued at 12.40.
